item.title: 1001 Miglia Italia - My Packing List
item.description: This is my packing list for 1001 Miglia Italia 2024. I am planning to pack everything into 2 bags (seat pack and frame pack). Additionally, I’ll carry 2 food pouches on my handlebar. I will carry a sleeping bag with me that allows me to sleep wherever and whenever I want. Besides I will prepare for the 2 bag drops that are offered by the organizers after 600 and 1000km.
